sen.j: 京極 高迢（きょうごく たかとお、寛保元年（1741年） - 宝暦12年4月24日 (旧暦)（1762年6月16日））は、讃岐国丸亀藩の世嗣。
sen.e: Takato KYOGOKU (born in 1741 and passed away on June 16, 1762) was an heir to Marugame domain of the Province of Sanuki.
Takato KYOGOKU (1741 - June 16, 1762) was an heir to Marugame Domain of Sanuki Province.
sen.cmt: 生没年の記載を訂正しました。Domain尾も喪時にしました。Sanuki Provinceに訂正しました。
sen.e: Takato KYOGOKU (1741 - June 16, 1762) was an heir to Marugame Domain of Sanuki Province.

sen.j: 京極高綏（3代藩主京極高或三男）の長男。
sen.e: He was the eldest son of Takao KYOGOKU (the third son of Takaaru KYOGOKU, the thir lord).
sen.cmt: 「京極高綏」の読み方が確認できませんでした。
sen.e: He was the eldest son of Takasui KYOGOKU (the third son of Takamochi KYOGOKU, the thir lord).
sen.cmt: 京極高綏→Takasui KYOGOKU京極高或→Takamochi KYOGOKUに訂正しました。[http://kotobank.jp/word/%E4%BA%AC%E6%A5%B5%E9%AB%98%E6%88%96]
sen.e: He was the eldest son of Takasui KYOGOKU (the third son of Takamochi KYOGOKU, the thir lord).

sen.j: 官位は従五位下、中務少輔。
sen.e: Takato's official court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), Nakatsukasa no Shoyu (Junior Assistant Minister of the Ministry of Central Affairs).
Takato's official court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), Nakatsukasa no Shoyu (Junior Assistant Minister of the Ministry of Central Affairs).
Takato's official court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade), Nakatsukasa no Shoyu (Junior Assistant Minister of the Ministry of Central Affairs).

sen.j: 伯父で4代藩主の京極高矩の養子となり、宝暦8年（1758年）徳川家重に拝謁する。
sen.e: He was adopted to his uncle, Takanori KYOGOKU, the fourth lord of the domain and in 1758 had an audience with Ieshige TOKUGAWA.
He was adopted to his uncle, Takanori KYOGOKU, the fourth lord of the domain and in 1758 had an audience with Ieshige TOKUGAWA.
He was adopted to his uncle, Takanori KYOGOKU, the fourth lord of the domain and in 1758 had an audience with Ieshige TOKUGAWA.

sen.j: 翌年叙任するが、宝暦12年（1762年）に22歳で早世した。
sen.e: AlthoughTakato was confered to Jugoinoge, Nakatsukasa no Shoyu in the following year, he died early at the age of 22 in 1762.
sen.cmt: 前出の官位に叙任された、と考えました。
sen.e: Although Takato was conferred to Jugoinoge, Nakatsukasa no Shoyu in the following year, he died early at the age of 22 in 1762.
sen.cmt: スペース補足しました。conferredスペル訂正しました。
sen.e: Although Takato was conferred to Jugoinoge, Nakatsukasa no Shoyu in the following year, he died early at the age of 22 in 1762.

sen.j: 代わって、高矩の長男・京極高中が嫡子となった。
sen.e: Takanaka KYOGOKU, Takanori's first son, was treated as the heir.
Takanaka KYOGOKU, Takanori's first son, was treated as the heir.
Takanaka KYOGOKU, Takanori's first son, was treated as the heir.
